name: Mythical Freaks
description:
Mythical Freaks is a fighting game where you play as a cryptid and fight other cryptids.  It's currently in development, and will eventually be released on iOS and Android.  Please send any feedback to closedumbrellagames@gmail.com.

Controls:

AD/Right Arrow and Left Arrow: move

Space: jump

P: punch

K: kick

B: block
